Entries.Outdoor_Haley: I'm trying to soak up some sun before the baby arrives. #$b# Once it's here, I'll probably be stuck inside for a while.$2
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I still look cute even though I'm pregnant... right?$s #$b# You think I'm even cuter now? $1 #$b# You always know how to cheer me up. $l
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Could you pick up something from the saloon for me tonight? #$b# I've been craving fruit salad! $1
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: The sound of the rain woke me up. $2 #$b# I think the baby likes it though--they've been kicking ever since I got out of bed. $1
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: I hope it stops raining soon. #$b# When the baby is here, I want them to get lots of sunshine. $h
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I think the baby likes the sound of the rain falling on the roof. $h
Entries.Rainy_Night_5: I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to stay inside.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: I think I might go to bed early tonight. #$b# Who knew being pregnant would be so exhausting?$2
Entries.patio_Haley: Remind me to get some more film before the baby gets here. #$b# If they're as cute as you, I'm going to need lots of pictures! $h
Entries.spring_1: Now that winter's over, we've got lots of sunny weather to look forward to. #$b# I'm happy that the baby will have lots of sunshine once they're here. $h
Entries.funLeave_Haley: I'm going to go see Emily today. #$b# I figure I should start being nicer to her if I want her to babysit soon. $s
Entries.funReturn_Haley: Emily gave me a crystal when I saw her earlier. [60 62 64 68 70] #$b# She said that it's correlated with fertility or something. #$b# I wasn't really listening. $1
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: We should go shopping in the city for some baby clothes soon. #$b# Emily said she wants to make the baby some clothes... but I 've never liked her style. $3
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: I was just thinking how weird it would be if I was about to have a child with Alex... $2 #$b# I'm so glad you came along, because I think he has a bit more growing up to do before he has a kid.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Leah lent me a book about home births the other day. $2 #$b# There's no way I'm ever going to do that.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Good morning, honey. I made you some coffee. [395] #$b# Just because I'm tired all of the time doesn't mean that you have to be. $h
Entries.Indoor_Day_Haley: I felt like I had no direction in life before I met you. Now I have exactly what I want.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_Haley: You look like you've been working hard, dear. Let me help you de-stress.$l
Entries.Outdoor_0: I always feel best when I'm outside, breathing fresh air.#$b#Don't get me wrong, your grandpa's old cottage is very nice! But nothing beats this beautiful landscape.
Entries.Outdoor_1: We've got to make sure the farm is cute! That might be important... right, honey?
Entries.Outdoor_2: Hi, honey! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!#$e#I'll be thinking of you.$h
Entries.Outdoor_3: I'm just going to do some dusting over here. That should help you out, right?#$e#*phew*... it's hot out here.
Entries.Outdoor_4: Don't overwork yourself, dear.#$e#Make sure and take a break every now and then, or get something to eat.$h
Entries.spring_2: So, what are we planting this season?
Entries.summer_3: Sorry if I don't look my best... the air is just so humid that my hair doesn't hold up too well.
Entries.summer_15: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies and ants... yuck.$s
Entries.fall_1: Fall is kind of sad for me... everything is dying.$5
